en: Don't forget the [G36](gun_to_buy) at the ammunation store!
Come on man! take yourself an [M16](gun_to_buy)!
Daddy, will you get me a [G36](gun_to_buy) as a birthday present...
I want you to by me a colossal and shinny [M16](gun_to_buy).
Leave right now and never come back unless you bring back an [M16](gun_to_buy) with you.
Take few [G36](gun_to_buy) with you, just in case...
Tell mom not to forget the [M16](gun_to_buy) at the local hillbilly market!
